title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
author: Charlie Egan
body: What is wrong with these critics? The movie is fantastic. Firth kicks ass which I did not expect at all and the main villain played by Samuel L Jackson is genius. A comical, kick ass film that I would happily watch again and again and again.
